joshua_project.description: Global missions data including people groups, countries, and evangelization metrics

world_bank.description: Development indicators including economic, social, and demographic data

dataset_info.merge_methodology: Countries matched using ISO3 country codes

files_created.description: Cross-analysis of economic development indicators with Gospel penetration metrics
visualization_potential: Scatter plot: GDP per capita vs Evangelical percentage
Bubble chart: Economic development vs Gospel progress (bubble size = population)
Grouped bar chart: Income categories vs Gospel categories
Heat map: Regional economic development vs evangelization levels

files_created.description: Human development indicators correlated with unreached population statistics
visualization_potential: Correlation matrix: Development indicators vs unreached populations
Scatter plot: Life expectancy vs percentage of unreached people
Multi-axis chart: Urbanization vs Gospel access over regions
Box plot: Distribution of development metrics by Gospel progress levels

files_created.description: Aggregated regional statistics combining economic, development, and missions data
visualization_potential: Polar/radar chart: Multi-dimensional regional comparison
Geographic map: Choropleth showing unreached populations by region
Parallel coordinates: Multi-dimensional regional analysis
Stacked area chart: Regional composition of global unreached populations

files_created.description: Digital infrastructure and internet penetration vs Gospel access analysis
visualization_potential: Scatter plot: Internet penetration vs Gospel access
Grouped analysis: Connectivity categories vs evangelization levels
3D visualization: Internet usage, urbanization, and Gospel progress
Trend analysis: Digital divide vs spiritual divide

files_created.description: Population size and demographic patterns vs unreached people group statistics
visualization_potential: Treemap: Countries sized by unreached populations
Sunburst chart: Population categories broken down by unreached status
Stream graph: Population flows and unreached concentrations
Proportional symbol map: Country populations with unreached overlays

files_created.description: Complete country-level dataset with all available Joshua Project and World Bank metrics
key_fields: All fields from both data sources
visualization_potential: Interactive dashboard: Filterable country profiles
Multi-select comparison tool: Side-by-side country analysis
Dynamic clustering: Countries grouped by similar characteristics
Time series potential: Historical analysis framework
